title: Ranked Borders
body: I know it's still close to the start of the season, but if I am a higher rank in flex will get I get the border of the higher rank instead of solo/duo queue?

replies.body:
Short answer yes.

Long answer, in normal queues your highest rank border will show, but in ranked queues, the border for that queue will show.

E.G You are silver in solo/duo but gold in flex. In normals and flex queue you will have a gold border, but in solo/duo queue you will have a silver one.

On a related note, you get the rewards relevant to your highest rank (though each queue usually has it's own icon), so even if you only get get gold in one queue you will still get the skin.
